Schedule Advising Appointments through OneDePaul. Bio and Research Information Theresa Steinbach, PhD is an Associate Dean in the College of Computing & Digital Media. She received a PhD in Computer Science from DePaul University. She also holds a MS in Information Systems, an MBA in Quantitative Economics, and a BA in Mathematics. Her research interests include Computer Science education, curriculum development and assessment, and learning communities for first-year college students.
